about_the_game:
Exactly what it says on the tin; Hook-a-duck, in VR!

Ever played the game where you catch rubber ducks with a rudimentary plastic fishing rod? possibly. What about the version where some of the ducks had outboard motors attached to their rear-end and can actually "fly"? unlikely. What about the even rarer variant where some of the ducks are invisible? impossible.

Hook-a-Duck VR is a simple VR interpretation of the classic fairground stalwart, with a few extra spicy additions.

Multiple gamemodes!

  • Simon Says: Catch only the ducks "Simon" (in this case a PC monitor) asks you to catch!
  • This or That: Put the ducks in the bucket that matches the sentence! If the sentence is "____ for dead", put it in the bucket that says "Left"!
  • Score attack and more: Time limit and score attack modes; catch all the ducks in the time limit & catch as many as you can in the time limit!

Duck variety!

  • Armed with an outboard motor and a helmet, some ducks can move when they want to!
  • A novel idea; Some ducks can actually fly!
  • Some ducks use a cloaking ability to evade capture, although impacts can reveal their position briefly!
  • Just like us, every Duck is different; some are big, some are small!
  • Other ducks are happy to be their own, unremarkable selfs. These ducks have no additional abilites at all!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5ghz Intel CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR-supported devices

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
